QuestData.Title: Alignment
QuestData.Description: The time of choosing has arrived, $n.$b$bWhile only members of the blue dragonflight may attend, Tarecgosa's binding makes your presence requisite.$b$bI must ask that you take on her form and vote on her behalf.$b$bDo not tarry. The moment of the eclipse draws near....
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Kalecgos to the blue dragon council.$b$bSpeak to Kalecgos in Coldarra when ready.
